trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that supports federated security.
Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple systems for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: La fédération est la capacité à partager des identités sur plusieurs systèmes pour authentification et autorisation.

trans-unit.source: These identities can refer to users or to machines.
trans-unit.target: Ces identités peuvent faire référence à des utilisateurs ou des ordinateurs.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support exclusively using transport security.
trans-unit.target: Le protocole HTTP fédéré prend en charge la sécurité SOAP, ainsi que la sécurité en mode mixte, mais il ne prend pas en charge exclusivement à l'aide de la sécurité de transport.

trans-unit.source: This binding provides [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] support for the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: Cette liaison fournit la prise en charge [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] pour le protocole WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Les services configurés avec cette liaison doivent utiliser le transport HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Bindings consist of a stack of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: Les liaisons se composent d’une pile d’éléments de liaison.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message>.
trans-unit.target: La pile d'éléments de liaison dans <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> est le même que celle contenue dans <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> lorsque <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> est défini avec la valeur par défaut de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> controls the details of the message security settings, the values of which are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> contrôle les détails des paramètres de sécurité de message, les valeurs de ceux qui sont disponibles à partir de l'instance de <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> retournée par la propriété <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> also provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> property to set and retrieve the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> fournit également une propriété <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> pour définir et récupérer l'URI où se trouve l'avis de confidentialité.

trans-unit.source: When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service built with [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contains the `establishSecurityContext` attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Lors de l’appel un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service intégré avec [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] à partir d’une application de client WCF créée avec [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] ou version antérieure, le fichier de configuration généré par svcutil.exe ou l’ajout d’une référence de service à partir de [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contient le `establishSecurityContext` attribut de la configuration de liaison.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application throws an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext ".
trans-unit.target: Cet attribut n'est pas reconnu par l'exécution de [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] et l'application génère une exception <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> avec le message « Attribut establishSecurityContext non reconnu ».

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the `establishSecurityContext` attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Pour contourner ce problème, supprimez le `establishSecurityContext` attribut à partir de la configuration de liaison.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding" /> class.

The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Les détails de ces paramètres sont disponibles depuis l'instance de <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> retournée par la propriété <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode" /> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding" /> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.

The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> est <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message> et spécifie que l'intégrité, la confidentialité et l'authentification du serveur et du client sont fournit à l'aide de la sécurité de message SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Les détails de ces paramètres sont disponibles depuis l'instance de <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> retournée par la propriété <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding" /> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
The binding element with the name <paramref name="configurationName" /> was not found.
The value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode" /> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
<see langword="true" /> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding" /> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> that makes up the binding.
The stack of binding elements depends on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> set.
trans-unit.target: La pile d'éléments de liaison dépend de la valeur de l'ensemble <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message>.
trans-unit.target: La pile d'éléments de liaison dans <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> est le même que celle contenue dans <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> lorsque <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> est défini avec la valeur par défaut de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message>.

trans-unit.source: However, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.TransportWithMessageCredential> results in a stack that is something of a hybrid between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> bindings.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, la définition de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> sur <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.TransportWithMessageCredential> produit une pile qui est quasiment hybride entre les liaisons <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> et <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, using the MTOM encoder looks exactly the same as for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Finalement, l'utilisation de l'encodeur MTOM revient exactement au même que pour <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> that has enabled a reliable session.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement" /> that has enabled a reliable session.
Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> from the current binding.
Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> où se trouve l'avis de confidentialité.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
The version number of the privacy notice.
trans-unit.target: Numéro de version de l'avis de confidentialité.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security used with this binding.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity" /> that specifies the mode of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Le <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity" /> qui spécifie le mode de sécurité utilisé avec cette liaison.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode" /> for this binding is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut du <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode" /> pour cette liaison est <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode.Message" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security" /> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
